About

Show version information for this software and plugins

A page that shows version information for this site.  Helpful for debugging, for giving credit to authors, and for linking to more complete documentation for admins.

PHP version

Tested with PHP 7.0

Web

  • GNU social https://www.gnu.org/s/social/

VersionAction

Version info page

Variables

  • pluginVersions - array to hold plugin information
  • contributors - HARDCODED array of contributors

isReadOnly

function isReadOnly($args)

Return true since we’re read-only.

Param

  • array $args - other arguments

Returns

  • boolean is read only action?

title

function title()

Returns the page title

@return string page title

prepare

protected function prepare(array $args = array())

Prepare to run

Fire off an event to let plugins report their versions.

Parameters

  • array $args - array misc. arguments

Returns

  • boolean success

handle

protected function handle()

Shows a page with the version information in the content area.

Parameters

  • array $args - ignored.

Returns

  • void

function showContentBlock()

Override to add h-entry, and content-inner classes

Returns

  • void
